title: Emerald and Diamond Floral Haaram with South Sea Pearl
materials: Natural Round Cut Emeralds (7.51ct total weight
Natural Round Cut Rubies (3.96ct total weight
features: Exquisite floral motif design with alternating Emerald and Diamond clusters. Features a central floral pendant with a large Emerald centerpiece surrounded by intricate diamond detailing. The pendant is gracefully finished with a single South Sea Pearl drop. The necklace showcases traditional Telugu design elements, with a modern and stylish flair. The diamonds are meticulously set in a pave setting, maximizing their brilliance.
occasions: festive celebrations like Diwali and Ugadi
and other grand occasions. It is also suitable for high-end parties and formal events.
description: This stunning Haaram represents the perfect blend of tradition and modern elegance. The vibrant green of the Emeralds symbolizes prosperity and new beginnings, while the diamonds represent eternal love. The South Sea Pearl adds a touch of sophistication and grace. Handcrafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad, this piece is a testament to exceptional craftsmanship and timeless beauty. A valuable heirloom to cherish for generations.
